tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Cervical Cerclage,Pregnancy Check Up,High-Risk Pregnancy Care,
review:
We wanted to express our  deepest gratitude for your exceptional care and support throughout my high-risk pregnancy journey. Your expertise and compassion were instrumental in guiding us through such a challenging time. Thanks to your diligent monitoring and personalized care, we welcomed our beautiful rainbow baby into the world. Your unwavering support not only ensured a safe delivery but also provided us with the reassurance and strength we needed during the pregnancy.
We cannot thank you enough for your dedication and kindness. You have made a profound impact on our lives, and we are forever grateful for your role in bringing our precious child into our family.  Thank you for being always there for me whenever I needed you .  
With your constant support , I finally got my rainbow baby. 
Because of you , we are smiling again.
Thank you so much for everything ü•∞ü•∞ü•∞ü•∞

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Preconception Counseling,Pregnancy Check Up,HPV vaccines,Pre and Post Delivery Care,
review:
I am  grateful for Dr. Jyoti, who guided us through every stage of bringing my baby into the world. From preconception counseling to pregnancy care and postnatal support, her expertise made the entire journey smooth for us. She is sensitive , ************* and help you understand the options so that you can take informed decisions. 
I highly recommend her
reply_text:
I too have seen your ups and down in your  journey of conception to delivery but your smile, your full faith, your inner strength made you sail through to your lovely goal... Thanks for your affection and kind words.

Congratulations and enjoy every moment

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
My heart is full of gratitude as I write this review for Dr. Jyoti Bhaskar, who delivered my first child through a C-section. I started my journey with Dr. Bhaskar in the 5th month of my pregnancy, and from our very first consultation to the moment I held my baby in my arms, her expertise, compassion, and dedication were evident at every step.

She is an exceptional blend of professionalism and empathy. She took the time to explain every aspect of the procedure (vaginal and csec), addressing all of my concerns and ensuring I felt comfortable and informed. Both me and my husband always left her room with a positive outlook, knowing we are in good hands.

During the surgery, Dr. Bhaskar's skill and precision were remarkable. The procedure was seamless, and her calm demeanor helped alleviate any anxiety I had. I felt completely safe under her care. The post-operative care she provided was equally outstanding. She was attentive, responsive, and genuinely concerned about my recovery and well-being.

I cannot thank Dr. Jyoti Bhaskar enough for the exceptional care she provided. She made what could have been a stressful experience into a joyous and memorable one. I wholeheartedly recommend Dr. Bhaskar to anyone in need of a caring, skilled, and compassionate obstetrician. She is truly a blessing to her patients and a remarkable professional in her field.

I would also like to thank the nursing staff at CloudNine for their care.  Special thanks to Trisha, Ritu, Nikita, Sunita and Anita for the support.
reply_text:
Saloni...I am.indebted to you for such kind  words and for penning down the whole journey with so much love and emotions.

I too developed a bond beyond patient relationship with both of you. Yes u had a lot of questions to ask but I prefer that for it helps us to make a shared decision and a decision that is right for all of us.

Congratulations and wish you three a beautiful and happy journey of life ahead.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Caesarean Section (C Section),Pre and Post Delivery Care,
review:
In summary, she is an exceptionally experienced doctor who embodies both professionalism and warmth‚Äîan uncommon blend in doctors today. Her care instills confidence and a sense of safety.
*** ****** *********** *********** ***** *** ************ I wholeheartedly recommend her.
I met Dr. Jyoti in June 2020, during the seventh month of my first pregnancy, after having unpleasant and rude experiences with two other gynaecologists. She was Godsend for me. She delivered both of my children, in 2020 and 2024, and I had a positive experience with her.
reply_text:
It is my Honour to deliver bith your babies and my good fortune to have met you , the strong determined girl who has decided to write her own destiny.

Congratulations to both of you

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr Jyoti is super experienced and we‚Äôre glad we chose her for our first pregnancy. *** ********* ** *** ******* ***** **** *** *** ** ******** *** ******** ** ******* We were never in doubt while being consulted by her. Special thanks to her for the way she took care of me for the last 10 months. Would be recommending her to all my friends :)
reply_text:
My heartwarming thanks for your appreciation. It was your confidence and trust in me that made this journey so enjoyable and beautiful.
Congratulations and best wishes for the new role as doting parents.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Pre and Post Delivery Care,Pregnancy with PCOD,
review: ** ***** ******* ** *** **** ***** ** ********* *** ***** **** **** *** *** ***** ******* *** ****** I consulted her from 25th weeks of pregnancy after returning from Europe. She provided me with best consultation and guidance which was better than even abroad doctors. She is patient with our doubts and also helped me calm down with my anxiety before delivery. I had GD and this was diet controlled with her guidance. I delivered a healthy baby via c-section by her . Even her surgery techniques are amazing due to which I had a smooth and speedy recovery without any complications. Highly recommended!!
reply_text:
Thanks so much for your appreciation and kind words... this is the biggest gift for a doctor. It was a great journey of 7 months together and if I have been able to make this journey smooth and comfortable,  I feel so encouraged 
Enjoy your parenthood..

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I had consulted with Dr. Jyoti Bhaskar when i got pregnant. She is very experienced and knowledgeable. Due to sjogren syndrome , i had risky pregnancy but this was handled by her in a very good way. She had not only explained the reports but also gave me strength and full support. She is very good in nature and caring for her patient.
Her whole team supported at every stage in my pregnancy journey and made it enjoyable.
reply_text:
It was quite a bumpy journey of 9 months and I can fully understand your anxiety and apprehension. The fact that you both did not once doubt my advise and put your all in following up , made you hold your angel in your hands. 
Now enjoy the parenthood and the soft touch of your child.
Congratulations and thanks.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,
review: I chose Dr. Jyoti Bhaskar on practo reading the reviews. she is the ever most professional doctor that I have come across in my life. she values your time. she explains everything in detail. she never suggest procedures/tests that are of benefit to herself. although the reason for us visiting was infertility but i think the positivity and peace of mind that came to us after reaching out to her and faith in her made us successful within 3 months of meeting her. thanks maam i salute your professionalism and absolutely admire it every time i think of any doctor around
reply_text:
You have overwhelmed me with your words and appreciation. It is nothing other than trust and positivity that helps us move forward... U trusted me and remained positive 
All the best to you both for the beautiful journey ahead

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pre and Post Delivery Care,Cesarean Delivery,
review:
My second pregnancy was a little complicate because of over weight and gestational diabetes and with this I had a fear of losing my baby as I wasn't able to find a good professional gynaecologist in Ghaziabad City, being new to this city we gave a try to one or two doctors but no one guided me properly but I was positive to find one and with the help of practo reviews we found Apollo Cradle and Dr. Jyoti Bhaskar. 
She's an amazing doctor & extremely professional also an empathetic person, your pregnancy and motherhood journey is a bliss when she's your gynecologist. Thank you doctor ‚ù§Ô∏è wish you long and healthy life..
Also if you are hygeine conscious then I would highly recommend Apollo Cradle. Maternity hospital with advance facilities and Top doctors who help in making your parenthood journey happy and memorable with care and warmth.
reply_text:
Thanks so much for such an awesome feedback. These words from you become a source of encouragement and the reason for me to strive harder for every couples happiness and safety. 
All my wishes and blessings to you and your family.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: *** ***** ******* * *********** *** **** ***** * ***** ** **** * she is an epitome of selflessness, empathy professionalism, and knowledge. We found her via innumerable positive reviews on Practo and must admit she is much more than what those reviews say. Very positive, practical and a little strict at times, she puts her heart and soul into the profession. Thank you so much Ma'm for guiding us throughout in the last 1.5 years.1 Eternally indebted for our little bundle of joy. We feel proud and honored to have met you - you are a rare soul. God bless you and your family! - Vidushi & Raghav
reply_text:
Vidushi and Raghav... U have opened up your heart and I am humbled. Yes , with experience and age comes the wisdom and when I see you youngsters, I feel intense compassion and can identify with your fears and apprehensions. Elders can afford to be strict because in that strictness is our concern. 
Enjoy your parenthood... Will see you again sometime.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dear ma'am,Thank you very much for helping us in bringing our angels in this beautiful world. You have provided such excellent care to us for the last couple of years especially during last 9 months. Your ever present compassion,attention to even minor details, support and care provided comfort during our difficult pregnancy. Aura of your great personality gave us sense of security and comfort of being in safe hands. You have been a blessing for us throughout our journey. It was so special to have you deliver our babies.  Thank you for being a great doctor and an extremely great human being. Sending my heartfelt thanks to you.üôÇüôÇüôÇüôÇ
reply_text:
Dr. Rachna ,

Yes it has been a long journey. But the fact that you trusted me despite all the ups and downs of the journey , is the biggest reward for me. 
You both have been the most positive couple I have seen and you had to be blessed with the angels.
I am just a means ... And thank you for choosing me to be the one.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
After recurrent miscarriages' of my wife, we were very disheartened.  Then we found Dr Jyoti Bhaskar via Practo reviews. In first visit itself,  we were very confident to be in the right place. We found her much more that what reviews said.  She is extremely empathetic, ************* *** professional. 
In the first attempt of diagnosis, she diagnosed and problem and prepared a plan for us.  Her treatment, guidance and care has changed the world for us. It just took us less than 1.5 years to be proud parents of baby boy from being hope-less. 
We will be indebted to you forever. we are extremely blessed to have  met you. You are a blessing to this world Mam. I am out of words to explain how grateful we are to you. üôèüôè

we wish you a very healthy and long life so that you can keep blessing this world with happiness. üôèüôè

Regards,
Shivani Kamboj & Neeraj
reply_text:
I am inturn indebted to you for your extensive heart felt words and sincere feelings. 
The joy of holding the baby in one's hand is inexplicable and if I have contributed to it , it is my good fortune 

Enjoy the parenthood and my love and blessings to the little one.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Dr. Jyoti Bhaskar have lots of patients but what makes you special is that you have a lot of patience. Thank you for sharing all risks and issues with delivery of my baby and bringing our little baby into this world safely. You are the best doctor in our vicinity.
First time we have consulted you at my 35th week I didn't feel the risk of changing my doctor at this time as she had discussed all my concerns and health history and reports on her own at the first consultation. The last few weeks that I have consulted you in my pregnancy under your medical supervision made me feel more confident for delivery and listening to all our doubts and concerns so patiently and politely.
I felt you bring all points to be discussed with patients without even asking anything by the patient. 
Our heartfelt thanks to you and your all Apollo Cradle Staff for all the love, support, care and of course for our baby.
reply_text:
This is the most treasured feedback I have received. It has underlined to me again that what matters most to my patients is transparency, honesty and patience.

If I did manage to make your motherhood enjoyable, it is my honour.

Thanks for taking time out to write.
I would have loved to know your name.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Pre and Post Delivery Care,Pregnancy,Obstetrics / Antenatal Care,
review: I would strongly recommend Dr.Jyoti Bhaskar Ma'am as gynaecologist & Obstetrician.I have been consulting her in Apollo Cradle hospital from over 10 months now. I never had any doubt on her advice . During the start of the pregnancy, my health became very critical. I could not even walk due to severe vomiting and nausea, but she gave me mental support and timely advice.Sometimes, I found her strict and scolding me like my mother, but i knew it was for my good. Delivery was very smooth and whole transition of me becoming mother was possible due to her advice and blessings.Today, I and my family are happy with our little angel.Past 10 months got passed leaving behind her imprints on my heart. Love you ma'am!Regards,Tuhina

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,
review: This was my first visit and I was pretty relaxed after meeting her. She explains everything very clearly, listens very patiently, gives ample time and leaves no stone unturned to satisfy her patient. She prescribes **** *** ********* tests and medicines. She went through all my previous reports and prescriptions thoroughly to know about my health issue in depth and made me understand every detail. Above all, her soft spoken nature and politeness made me feel happier. I would highly recommend Dr. Jyoti Bhaskar for any gynaecological issue.
reply_text:
Young girls are close to my heart. In you lies the potential to achieve impossible and so I try my best not to let your health perceptions , stop you from achieving it.
Your feedback is encouraging for me...
All the best to you.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I had no reference for Jyoti mam from anyone. I have just googled her when i was planning to conceive. and fortunately, this was my best decision. From planning to conceive till delivering our child. she was with us throughout the whole journey. From the day I have conceived - she was all practical yet caring for me. she always told me that you are just pregnant not ill. she always encouraged me to be normal in pregnancy period and always guided me the best. she never scared me out of any small problems i had in my pregnancy. Unfortunately, in the 9th month I had a complication, but she managed that complication so gracefully and under her great guidance and experience we are now the proud parents. Thank you so much mam for everything. All the very best for your future. and I hope you will always remember us :) .

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
*** ** * **** ***** ************* * **** **** ******* I know her from past 4years for every single gynaecological problem I reached out to her.
 And recently under her guidance I delivered a healthy baby girl after recurrent miscarriages. The best part of her is that she minutely monitor the pregnancy week by week and proactively takes the actions against any hiccups. She has excellent approach of satisfying your queries. She is easily accessible. Moreover she is kind human being. Thank u soo much ma'am for everything.. U made possible an impossible thing for us.. May God bless u always..
reply_text: One develops bonds of friendship and concern in the relationship of doctor and patient. And when the pregnancies are medically challenging, it is not just for the couple but the doctor who goes through moments of anxiety and deep concern. U were a wonderful couple and your baby is a joy for me too. All my wishes to you four.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I would highly recommend Dr. Jyoti Bhaskar. Her experience adds to the quality of her treatment. I had slight complication in my pregnancy. She helped me understand the problem and guided me through that phase.  I was scared that I might have to go for c-section,but I had told ma'am to try for normal delivery first. Ma'am had helped me in my normal delivery. and I remember saying"I love you ma'am" after my baby was born.üôÇAnd yes the best thing is she will listen to your problem and guide you through it. and waiting time is also not much.. She considers patients to follow the waiting number which makes it easy for us.
reply_text: I am late in replying back but I was indeed very touched by your words.. I love you ma'm. U have been a couple who has believed in me despite difficult times . May the three of you enjoy the bliss of a loving family.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: PCOD/PCOS Treatment,Diseases in Pregnancy,Nutrition for Pregnant Women,Pre-Pregnancy Counselling,Pregnancy Scan,
review:
Go to go doctor for me. I highly recommend Dr Jyoti mam to everybody. ********* ********* ** *** ***** *** very much updated too. In first meeting only she clearly described our problem, changes needs to be done for healthy life to get better result. She completely taken care of my wife during entire pregnancy and have taken all precautions to avoid high risk pregnancy. Within  amonth of meeting we have seen positive results. Backup is always there for any emergency. There was risk at the time of delivey as labour pain starts early but mam handles the situation very well and blessed with healthy baby girl. 
She completely take cares of her patient and very polite in nature.
reply_text: Congratulations and my blessings to the angel in your house. U both have always had a positive attitude and most importantly faith in me. Thanks for your efforts in sharing your feedback. It means a lot to me.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
We suffered huge stress and setback in my wife's pregnancy during 2016.
In 2019,God really helped us and made path to meet Dr Jyoti.At present my beloved wife is in healthy 32 week of pregnancy under through disciplined guidelines of Dr Jyoti and same strict and smily compliance by my wife.Both seems best for each other,even when sometimes Dr Jyoti becomes tougher for benefit of her patient and baby.We thank Dr Jyoti for this journey with result soon expected.But we both request to Dr Jyoti for blessing us by trying NORMAL DELIVERY as far as possible.
Er. Sachin and Deepika Bhatnagar.
reply_text: The pregnancy has come by the blessings of the God, the goodness in you both and love of your family.... So will the baby. .. Rest assured...

tags: Doctor friendliness,Wait time,
review: Jyoti Bhaskar is an awesome Doctor and more than that she is an awesome human being. we had consulted her for our pregnancy and she had been nothing but patient with us through out those 9 months. She always scolded us when we did not follow her instructions like any elder person would do who cares for you. I still remember after the delivery of our baby, she had come to visit us in the ward and finally she said to my wife , " You have been a good patient" üòÄ To conclude this, I just want to extend my thanks to Jyoti Mam and highly recommend her as a Gynac üòÄ
reply_text:
I am sorry for the late reply.... Just saw it today while on a holiday.

Indeed Priyanka was a good patient... she carried her pregancy without any apprehension and always smiled despite my being tight with her.

Bless you both and hope the baby brings abundant joy in your life.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
We have started our journey towards parenthood with Dr. Jyoti Bhaskar and she has done a brilliant job throughout the journey. She is kind hearted,  very puntual with her OPD timings, and has always responded to the queries we had in the best possible way.

The overall experience has been fantastic!!! We happily recommend her to everyone looking for consultation in this area.

In real simple words, we couldn't have asked for any more!!! Thank you ma'am for making it so easy for us!!!

BR,
Aditi Dhama
reply_text:
Aditi..... It is your journey.. I have just held your hand along the way.
And yes thanks .. for letting me realise that I need to be more punctual.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr Jyoti Bhaskar is not only a superb doctor but a great human being as well . She is so patient and really takes care of her patients . People like her still make us believe that humanity and care are still prevelent and money is not everything . She always there and is never in a rush . Me and my wife decided to undertake her consultation last year and It‚Äôs best decision we took . She is a role model not for all the doctors but for others as well .Thank you mam for everything ! Best regards : Megha and Tushar
reply_text: Such beautiful words and that too unknowingly on my birthday..thanks Megha and Tushar.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
We meet Dr for menstrual disorder and issue in conceiving, She first understand the issue with details and take note of all existing tests/treatment. Explain the issue and treatment in a way that non-medical person can understand. Highly recommended for all Obstetrics and gynecology issues.
I feel while A Dr's prescription/medicines are the key to treatment but their behavior of treating patients and answering queries adds an extra satisfaction factor in patient's mindset which help them more than medicines.
